Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴル
Entry.EnglishText: Igor

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル
Entry.EnglishText: Doval

Entry.JapaneseText: ハック
Entry.EnglishText: Hack

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: レイ
Entry.EnglishText: Rei

Entry.JapaneseText: トッポ
Entry.EnglishText: Topp

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 酋長の家
Entry.EnglishText: Chief's House

Entry.JapaneseText: 酋長の家
Entry.EnglishText: Chief's House

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>、<Tytree>、 歩きながら考えろ。 立ち止まっているヒマはない。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>, <Tytree>. We can ponder it as we walk. We haven't the time to dawdle right now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、そうだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I know.

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、今はハックに 話を聞くのが先だ。 ラジルダへ、向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, we need to go talk to Hack. Let's head on over to Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: ケガはないか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Is anyone hurt!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なぜガジュマを助ける!?
Entry.EnglishText: ...Why are you helping Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを助けたんじゃない。 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>の仲間を助けたんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not helping Gajuma. I'm lending a hand to my fellow <Yellow>Man<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕にも手伝わせてください！
Entry.EnglishText: Allow me to help as well!

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅で見つけた薬もあるし、 治療ぐらいならできますよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I should be able to use the medicine I've acquired during my travels to treat anyone who's in need of medical care!

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>の仲間…… ……うむ……共に戦おう……
Entry.EnglishText: Helping one's fellow <Yellow>Man<White>... All right, then. Let's fight together.

Entry.JapaneseText: これで終わりじゃないぞ。 みんなで協力して、 バイラスを倒すんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: We've got a lot of work ahead of us. If we work together, we should be able to defeat these Biruses!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>二級民<White>だったら、 俺たち<Red>優良民<White>の言うとおり、 さっさと子供を探しに行けよっ！
Entry.EnglishText: You <Red>Lesser Citizens<White> should just do as we <Red>Greater Citizens<White> say. Hurry up and find those kids!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんですって！
Entry.EnglishText: How dare you!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの娘も、そうやって 階級をたてに、ウチのぼうやを たぶらかしたんでしょうに！
Entry.EnglishText: It was probably <Italic>your</Italic> daughter who tricked my little boy using her higher class status!

Entry.JapaneseText: この<Red>毛むくじゃら<White>めが！ <Red>優良民<White>に盾つくつもりなら ドバル様に言いつけるぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Tch, <Red>damned furries<White>! If you plan on defying the orders of the <Red>Greater Citizens<White>, then I'll just have to let Chief Doval know of this!

Entry.JapaneseText: よせ!! 同じガジュマ同士で 争ってどうするんだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Cut it out! You're all Gajuma, aren't you? Why are you arguing with each other?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは引っ込んでな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stay out of this, Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは引っ込んでて!!
Entry.EnglishText: This doesn't concern you, Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: いいかげんにしろ！
Entry.EnglishText: You're all being fools!

Entry.JapaneseText: 事情はわからんが、 子供がいなくなったようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: I might not know exactly what's going on, but I take it that your children have gone missing?

Entry.JapaneseText: 争う前に、探しに 行くべきではないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Instead of bickering, shouldn't you be out looking for them?

Entry.JapaneseText: 子供を探しに行っている間に、 この<Red>二級民<White>どもは 俺たちの悪い噂を広めて、 階級を入れ替えるつもりなのさ！
Entry.EnglishText: We would, but these damned <Red>Lesser Citizens<White> would rather be slandering us while we're out searching, so that they can take our place in the hierarchy!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたたちこそ、 私たちを村から追い出す つもりなんでしょ!?
Entry.EnglishText: But if we were to leave, I know you'd want to keep us out!

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、一緒に行けば いいじゃねぇか！
Entry.EnglishText: Then why don't you guys go looking for them together?

Entry.JapaneseText: 誰がこんな<Red>二級民<White>と……！
Entry.EnglishText: I can't work with a <Red>Lesser<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私だって……！
Entry.EnglishText: The feeling is mutual!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もういい。 オレたちが探しに行く。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Oh forget it. We'll go looking for them.

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、<Veigue>、 ナイスなアイデアだぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, <Veigue>, that's a nice idea!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたらはそうやって 一生ケンカしてな。
Entry.EnglishText: You guys can just stay here and keep fighting for the rest of your lives or something.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まったく……！ 下等な<Red>毛むくじゃら<White>なんかと 遊ぶからこんな事になるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: For goodness' sake! See, this is what happens when you play with lower-class <Red>furries<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: いいか？ もう二度と、 <Red>二級民<White>の子と遊ぶんじゃないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't let me catch you playing with that <Red>Lesser<White> child again, do you hear me?

Entry.JapaneseText: で、でもわたし……
Entry.EnglishText: B-But, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何を言ってるのかしら。 階級がなければ、何もできない <Red>羽まみれ<White>のくせに、偉そうに……
Entry.EnglishText: You're one to talk! You <Red>featheries<White> would be worthless if it weren't for this class system...
Entry.Notes: Featheries is correct but QA flagged.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>羽まみれ<White>なんかと遊ぶなんて、 こっちこそやめさせるわ！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't worry, I'll be the one to make sure your child never plays with mine!

Entry.JapaneseText: トッポ、<Red>羽まみれ<White>の子なんかと 仲良くしちゃダメよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Topp, I don't want you playing with that <Red>feathered<White> child ever again!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ぼく……
Entry.EnglishText: But we...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう……もういや！ いやだったらいやだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh, I hate this! It's so stupid!

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、どうして!? どうしてトッポと 遊んじゃいけないの？
Entry.EnglishText: C'mon, why? Why can't I play with Topp!?

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしたちはただ、前みたいに なかよく遊びたいだけなのに…… どうしていけないの!?
Entry.EnglishText: We just wanna play together like we did before... Why can't we!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメなものはダメなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's unacceptable because it just is!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>毛むくじゃら<White>とオレたち<Red>優良民<White>では、 能力も美しさも格段に違うだろ!?
Entry.EnglishText: We <Red>Greater Citizens<White> possess competence and aesthetics unlike those of <Red>furries<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 羽がいけないの……!? 羽のせいで会わせてくれないの？
Entry.EnglishText: It's because I have feathers?! We can't play together because I have feathers?

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、こんな羽…… なくなっちゃえ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Then...then I'll... I'll get rid of them!!

Entry.JapaneseText: あの子、 翼を切るつもりよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: She's going to cut her wings!

Entry.JapaneseText: よせ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stop!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……こんな風に 子供を追い詰めて……
Entry.EnglishText: ...You made a child feel like she had no other choice...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたたちは 恥ずかしくないのか！
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you ashamed of yourselves!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 黙れヒューマ！
Entry.EnglishText: Be quiet, Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ……ガジュマ…… あんたらの言う種族って何だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: "Huma this," "Gajuma that," what even is race to you guys!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 姿の違いが そんなに大きな事なのか！
Entry.EnglishText: Are physical differences really that important!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何の騒ぎだ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's going on out here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル酋長…… あんたは言ったな。
Entry.EnglishText: Chief Doval... You said it yourself, didn't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う種族がいるから争う。 交わらずに生きるしかないと。
Entry.EnglishText: That the existence of different races causes conflict, so the races have to live apart.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、今のこの状況は何なんだ…… 同じ種族で争っているじゃないか!?
Entry.EnglishText: But what the hell is happening here? Isn't everyone fighting each other despite being of the same race!?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたらの守りたい <Red>種族<White>って何だ!?
Entry.EnglishText: What is this <Red>race<White> that you're trying to protect!?

Entry.JapaneseText: コケコッコー!!
Entry.EnglishText: Cock-a-doodle-doo!!

Entry.JapaneseText: よぉ、あんたらか。 ひさしぶりだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Hello, long time no see.

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴル！ 会えてよかった…… あんたに頼みたい事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: Igor! It's so good to see you... There's something I want to ask of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺に？ 一体、なんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Of me? What do you need?

Entry.JapaneseText: 鎮魂錠が必要なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We need a Requiem Pastille.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鎮魂錠？ ああ、あるぜ。 ラジルダから逃げる時、 かろうじて持ち出したヤツがな。
Entry.EnglishText: You need a Requiem Pastille? Yeah, I have some. I was able to take some with me when I escaped Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: 分けてもらえないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Could you share one with us?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、いいぜ。 ホラ、持って行きな。
Entry.EnglishText: Sure. Here you go.

Entry.JapaneseText: すまない。
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry for the trouble.

Entry.JapaneseText: 気にしなさんな。 他でもない、あんたたちのためだ。 さあ、行きな。急ぐんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Don't worry about it. I'd help you with just about anything. You're in a hurry, right? Better get a move on.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ありがとう！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah. Thanks!

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族の違いなんて、何もないんだ。 違いがある、だなんて思うから、 気になるだけで。
Entry.EnglishText: There are no differences between our races. It is only because we imagine there to be that we become so anxious about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今だって、こうやって普通に話せてる。 ヒューマもガジュマも同じさ。 そうだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Even at this moment, we're able to talk normally with each other. Huma and Gajuma are indeed the same, are they not?

Entry.JapaneseText: すぐにみんな気づくはずだ。 ヒューマもガジュマも関係ない……
Entry.EnglishText: They'll all realize it soon enough. That it's not about being Huma or Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちはみんな、ヒト。 助け合う仲間なんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: We are all human beings. We are friends who support one another.

Entry.JapaneseText: ＝＝＝イゴル＝＝＝ バイラス撃退イベント後にここに配置。
家を追い出されちまったよ。 なんでも捕まえたヒューマを 閉じ込めるとかでさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I ended up getting kicked out of my house. They said they needed a place to lock up the Huma they were imprisoning.

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、酋長命令だし しょうがないけどな。
Entry.EnglishText: But it was the Chief's orders, so I had no choice but to comply.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>？ ええ、知ってるわ。 子供の頃からよく聞いたもの。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White>? Yep, I know about it. I heard a lot about it as a kid.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私に聞くよりも、 この先の家に住むおじいさんに 聞いた方が早いわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: But rather than telling you myself, it would be faster to ask about the details from the old man in the house down the street.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私が知る限り、<Cyan>聖壇<White>に 何かが捧げられていたっていう おぼえはないけど……
Entry.EnglishText: As for the <Cyan>shrine<White>, I don't recall hearing anything about bringing an offering, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖なる場所だから、 何か特別な物なんだろうね……
Entry.EnglishText: It's a sacred place. There must be something special about it...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして私たちが、この村で 一番、低い身分にされなくちゃ ならないのかしら……！
Entry.EnglishText: Why the hell should we have the lowest status in this village...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>特等民<White>や<Red><Red>優良民<White>の人たちの バカにした目が許せないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't stand the way those <Red>Superior<White> and <Red>Greater Citizens<White> sneer at me every time I pass by them...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは私たちより低い <Red>劣等民<White>だっていうけど、 この村にはいないもの。 気休めにもなりゃしない。
Entry.EnglishText: They tell us that Huma are more <Red>Inferior<White>, than us, but there aren't even any in this village. It's hardly a consolation.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが この村に何しに来たの!? 出ていきなさい!!
Entry.EnglishText: What's a Huma doing in this village!? Get out of here!

Entry.JapaneseText: 階級がなんぼのもんか 知らないけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care what his rank is, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: あの<Red>羽まみれ<White>は、私たちを 村から追い出して、この村を もっと広く使おうとしてるのよ！
Entry.EnglishText: That <Red>birdbrain<White> is trying to kick us out from the village so he can take our land for his own use.

Entry.JapaneseText: トッポ……
Entry.EnglishText: Topp...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何の音かしら…… 砂漠の向こうから聞こえてくる……？
Entry.EnglishText: What's that sound...? Is it coming from across the desert...?

Entry.JapaneseText: トッポには、悪いことをしたわ。 子供の気持ちに気づけない親なんて……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been a horrible mother to Topp. What kind of parent can't even recognize their own child's feelings...

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族って、本当に何かしら……
Entry.EnglishText: Just what does race even mean...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのあなたたちの言葉だから、 余計に考えてしまうわ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's because you Huma are bringing it up that I'm reflecting on it even more.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマと一緒にいて、どう？ あなたは何も感じないの？
Entry.EnglishText: How is it hanging around with a Huma? Do you really think nothing strange of it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマ……
Entry.EnglishText: A Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いえ、あなたたちには感謝しているわ。 トッポを連れ帰ってきてくれて、 ありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...No, I should be grateful to you. Thank you for bringing Topp back home.

Entry.JapaneseText: うちの子…… どこ行ったのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: My boy... Where in the world is he?

Entry.JapaneseText: 困っているヒトがいたら、 みんなで助け合う。 当たり前のことなんです。
Entry.EnglishText: If someone's in trouble, we help each other out. It's only natural.

Entry.JapaneseText: 当たり前のことだから、 普通にそうできていた頃があった。 また戻ればいいだけなんですよね。
Entry.EnglishText: There was a time when that was the norm. We just need to go back to how it was before.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒュー……おっと、違う違う。 僕たちは、ヒト。 そうですよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Hum... Oops, no, no, no. We are all human beings. Isn't that right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ＝＝＝ハック＝＝＝ バイラス撃退イベント後にここに配置。
何かあったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did something happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、おまえは？
Entry.EnglishText: Who are you people?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、キ、キミたちは……！ た、助けて!
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, it's you guys! Please help me!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはハック……？ 一体、どうしたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: You're Hack, aren't you? What's going on here?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちも、 こいつの仲間か!?
Entry.EnglishText: Are you people friends with this guy!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 知り合いだ。 この男が何かしたのか？
Entry.EnglishText: He's an acquaintance of ours. What did he do?

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らが部族の 聖なる場所を荒らしたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We caught him vandalizing our tribe's holy place!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、誤解だって 言ってるじゃないか。 僕は悪い事は何もしてないって……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been trying to tell them that it's all just a big misunderstanding. I wasn't doing anything wrong...

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく俺たちと一緒に来い！ ドバル酋長がお怒りだ。 おまえをどうするかは酋長が決める。
Entry.EnglishText: Whatever, you're coming with us! Chief Doval is going to be furious. He'll figure out what to do with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと待ってくれ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Wait just a moment...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 文句があるなら、 酋長に掛け合え。
Entry.EnglishText: If you've got a problem with it, you can take it up with the Chief.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、どうなってんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Man, what's going on here?

Entry.JapaneseText: わからない。<Blue>眠れる翼<White>の事もあるが、 ハックを放っておくわけにもいかない。 酋長のところへ行ってみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know. Even though we're supposed to be searching for the <Blue>Sleeping Wings<White>, we can't just leave Hack like this. Let's go speak to the Chief.

Entry.JapaneseText: もしかしたら、酋長さんが <Blue>眠れる翼<White>のコトを 知ってるかもしれないしネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Who knows, maybe the Chief might know something about the <Blue>Sleeping Wings<White>, too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 子供がいなくなったのは、 <Red>二級民<White>のせいだぜ!?
Entry.EnglishText: It's all cause of those <Red>Lesser Citizens<White> that those kids are gone!

Entry.JapaneseText: それなのに、俺たちの責任にされて、 そのせいで、格下げになったら たまったもんじゃねえ！
Entry.EnglishText: But then we're the ones who end up being held responsible about it and we got demoted. I won't take this lying down!

Entry.JapaneseText: 階級がなんぼのもんか知らないけど、 あの<Red>羽まみれ<White>は、 私たちを村から追い出して、この村を もっと広く使おうとしてるのよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care what his rank is, but that <Red>birdbrain<White> is trying to kick us out of the village to take our land for himself!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があっても ドバル様だけでも 守り抜かねば……
Entry.EnglishText: We need to protect Chief Doval no matter the cost.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちの召し使いが 村の子らを見つけてきてくれた事は 感謝する。
Entry.EnglishText: We are grateful that your servants were able to find those children.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、 ヒューマが我らガジュマより 格下である事には変わりないのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: However, that still does not change the fact that Huma are inferior to us Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル酋長はヒューマには お会いにならない……
Entry.EnglishText: Chief Doval will not agree to meet with any Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: あのイゴルとかいうヒューマ…… バイラスを倒しやがった……
Entry.EnglishText: That Huma named Igor... He beat the Birus...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの中にも スゴイ奴がいるんだな……
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose there are still some impressive Huma around.

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル酋長はお忙しいのだ。 邪魔をするな。
Entry.EnglishText: Chief Doval is busy. Do not disturb him.

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル様は我が村に なくてはならないお方。
Entry.EnglishText: Chief Doval is an indispensable individual to our village.

Entry.JapaneseText: 例えどんな天変地異があろうとも、 この身をはってお守りする……！
Entry.EnglishText: No matter what disaster we may face, I will protect him with my body and soul!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの召し使いは ヒューマのくせに、 偉そうな事を言いおって……！
Entry.EnglishText: You Huma are merely servants, yet you dare speak out of turn...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 本来なら許さんところだが、 ドバル様の温情あって許されているのだ。 ありがたく思え！
Entry.EnglishText: I would normally not permit such an action, but Chief Doval has graciously tolerated your behavior. You should be grateful!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは帰った、 帰った！
Entry.EnglishText: The Huma has returned. He's back!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>ヒト<White>…… 本当にそんなものが あるんだろうか……
Entry.EnglishText: <Cyan>Mankind<White>... Is there really such a concept...?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたらヒューマも 俺らガジュマも同じ<Cyan>ヒト<White>…… わからん……いや……認められん……
Entry.EnglishText: You Huma and we Gajuma are both <Cyan>human beings<White>...? Can that really be...? No... I cannot accept it...

Entry.JapaneseText: だが……
Entry.EnglishText: But...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはドバル酋長の家だ。 用がないならさっさと帰れ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is Chief Doval's house. If you have no business here, return home.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこはこの村の酋長、 ドバル様の家だ。 勝手に入るな。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the house of our leader, Chief Doval. Do not enter without permission.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは相変わらず、 ヒューマ嫌いが激しいわね。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, the hatred towards Huma here is as intense as ever.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、なんか前と少し違う ような気がするんですけど？
Entry.EnglishText: But something about this place seems different than before.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうよね…… 何だか、ガジュマ同士も うまくいってないみたい……
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed... The Gajuma don't seem to be getting along, even among themselves.

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、ドバル酋長に 話を聞いてみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: For now, let's just go and talk to Chief Doval.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
